item.title: 【Albums (lossy)】MP3 - The Baseballs - Good Ol' Christmas
item.description:
Enjoy this unique album from The Baseballs.
Good ol' Christmas is set in a 1950's 1960's Doo-wop Rock 'n Roll style.

File info:
All tracks are in mp3 high quality sound. If you own a DTS Sound unbound or Dolby headphones, the sound is in special sound.
MPEG Layer 3 audio - Various bitrates.

Tracks:

01 Let It Snow! Let It Snow! Let It Snow!
02 Have Yourself a Merry Little Christmas
03 Little Drummer Boy
04 Ring Ring (A Lovely Sound)
05 Silent Night
06 Winter Wonderland
07 Driving Home for Christmas
08 Father to A Child
09 Rocking Around the Christmas Tree
10 Dry Your Tears
11 O Holy Night
12 Wonderful Dream (Holidays Are Coming)
13 Rudolph, the Red-Nosed Reindeer


(c) 2012 Warner Music Entertainment.
Release date: November 2, 2012

Support The Baseballs and see all their music!
https://music.apple.com/nl/artist/the-baseballs/311665738
